description: A notification initiated by the Seller to the Buyer providing subsequent status information on “Acknowledged” orders such as service delivery confirmation, error, and/or jeopardy messages.
title: orderNotification

___projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

___completionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller completed the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___orderCancellationReason.description: An optional free-form text field for the seller to provide additional information regarding the reason that the order was cancelled.

___orderMessages.description: An array of messages associated with this Order.

$eref.description: Details of a message for an Order.
$eref.title: orderMessage

___field.description: The field / attribute on the Order associated with the Message.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference to the item on the Order to which this notification applies.

___correctionRequired.description: Indicates whether the Buyer must submit an updated Order to resolve the error/jeopardy condition.

___messageInformation.description: A description of the error condition or information to be conveyed to the Buyer.

___code.description: The code associated with this Message.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderMessage.

___uniSvlanIds.description: An array of the S-VLAN IDs (or ID ranges) assigned by the Seller to UNIs on this Order.

$eref.description: An assignment made by the Seller of a SVLAN ID to a UNI or ENNI endpoint.
$eref.title: svlanIdAssignment

___sellerUniId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for the UNI for this SVLAN ID assignment.

___sellerEnniId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for the ENNI for this SVLAN ID assignment.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, svlanIdAssignment.

___svlanId.description: The SVLAN ID assigned to this UNI or ENNI

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___sellerOrderContact.description: TIdentifies the name of the person or office that is handling the Order within the Seller's organization.

___enniSvlanIds.description: An array The S-VLAN IDs (or ID ranges) assigned by the Seller to ENNIs on this Order.

$eref.description: An assignment made by the Seller of a SVLAN ID to a UNI or ENNI endpoint.
$eref.title: svlanIdAssignment

___sellerUniId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for the UNI for this SVLAN ID assignment.

___sellerEnniId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for the ENNI for this SVLAN ID assignment.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, svlanIdAssignment.

___svlanId.description: The SVLAN ID assigned to this UNI or ENNI

___sellerId.description: The ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the order.

___requestedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the customer's requested completion date for the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___buyerId.description: The ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the order.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderNotification.

___sellerEnniIds.description: An array of The IDs assigned by the Seller to the ENNIs on this Order.

$eref.description: An assignment made by the Seller of an ID to a UNI, ENNI, or OVC.
$eref.title: idAssignment

___buyerAssignedId.description: The id used by the Buyer for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id), if known. If the buyerAssignedId is not specified, the Order Id (or buyerPurchaseOrderNumber) and orderItemReference must be provided.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item for the service that this Id Assignment applies to.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, idAssignment.

___sellerAssignedId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id).

___billingAccountNumber.description: Identifies the Billing Account to use to bill the ordered products.

___correctionOrderDueDate.description: Date by which the corrected/amended order must be sent to the Seller to ensure that the order is not CANCELLED. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___expectedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller expects to complete the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___correctionOrderExpected.description: If true, the Buyer is expected to send a corrective (supplemental) order as a replacement order.

$eref.description: An assignment made by the Seller of an ID to a UNI, ENNI, or OVC.
$eref.title: idAssignment

___buyerAssignedId.description: The id used by the Buyer for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id), if known. If the buyerAssignedId is not specified, the Order Id (or buyerPurchaseOrderNumber) and orderItemReference must be provided.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item for the service that this Id Assignment applies to.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, idAssignment.

___sellerAssignedId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id).

___sellerOvcId.description: The ID assigned by the Seller to the OVC on this Order.

___sellerUniIds.description: An array of The IDs assigned by the Seller to the UNIs on this Order.

$eref.description: An assignment made by the Seller of an ID to a UNI, ENNI, or OVC.
$eref.title: idAssignment

___buyerAssignedId.description: The id used by the Buyer for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id), if known. If the buyerAssignedId is not specified, the Order Id (or buyerPurchaseOrderNumber) and orderItemReference must be provided.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item for the service that this Id Assignment applies to.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, idAssignment.

___sellerAssignedId.description: The id assigned by the Seller for a UNI, ENNI, or OVC (E.g. circuit id).

___buyerOrderVersion.description: The version number that the Buyer uses to refer to this particular version of the order.

___orderId.description: Unique identifier for the order that is generated by the Seller when the order is initially accepted via an API.

___orderCancellationDate.description: Identifies the date that the Seller cancelled the Order.

___notes.description: Free form text to clarify or explain the notification.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies a order within the buyer's enterprise.

___notificationVersion.description: An integer string that indicates the version of the Notification. Tha value must be incremented on each Notification sent by the Seller to the Buyer..
